title: crypt0m4nia
author: crypt0m4nia
content: Shopping for sneakers, I have my eye on air force 1, can't decide which model. What kind of sneakers do you like, guys?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: For me it is going to be mostly about being comfortable and not styles. We must take care of our feet and protect them for when we get older and we can stay healthy and mobile. It is hard to find a perfect fit for our feet. But I am going to say it is affordable for me to use Nike flex control sneakers. It really makes my feet feel comfortable if I have them. Adidas racer is a other good sneaker I can wear for comfort.

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: For me my favorite sneaker is sketcher very comfortable in leg

comments.author: Oland4ever
comments.body: I mostly buy Nike Air Max and I think they are of good quality.
